root.description: This application compute for each studied polyline, contained in the input VectorData, the chosen descriptors.

parameter.name: Input Image
parameter.description: An image to compute the descriptors on.

parameter.name: Vector Data
parameter.description: Vector data containing the polylines where the features will be computed.

parameter.name: Default elevation
parameter.description: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.

parameter.name: Feature expression
parameter.description: The feature formula (b1 < 0.3) where b1 is the standard name of input image first band

parameter.name: Feature name
parameter.description: The field name corresponding to the feature codename (NONDVI, ROADSA...)

parameter.name: Output Vector Data
parameter.description: The output vector data containing polylines with a new field
